mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, user_id, material_adapt, dispatch_efficiency, gov_suggestion, is_gov_feedback, content, create_time FROM biz_evaluation WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT id, order_id, user_id, material_adapt, dispatch_efficiency, gov_suggestion, is_gov_feedback, content, create_time FROM biz_evaluation WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT id, order_id, user_id, material_adapt, dispatch_efficiency, gov_suggestion, is_gov_feedback, content, create_time FROM biz_evaluation WHERE is_gov_feedback = #{isGovFeedback} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_evaluation ( order_id, use r_id, material_adapt, dispatch_efficiency, gov_suggestion, is_gov_feedback, content, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{materialAdapt}, #{dispatchEfficiency}, #{govSuggestion}, #{isGovFeedback}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_evaluation SET is_gov_feedback = #{isGovFeedback}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pending, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS handled FROM biz_evaluation
SELECT e.*, u.real_name, u.phone, u.email FROM biz_evaluation e LEFT JOIN user u ON e.user_id = u.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_evaluation SET status = #{status}, reply = #{reply}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
